title: Randy Rides Alone 1934 (Action, Western) John Wayne, Gabby Hayes, Alberta Vaughn | Movie

sources.title: Randy Rides Alone 1934 (Action, Western) John Wayne, Gabby Hayes, Alberta Vaughn | Movie
sources.description:
Fearless, he rode the danger trail!
Randy is jailed for murders he didn't commit. Knowing he is innocent, Sally Rogers breaks him out. Fleeing the Sheriff, he stumbles into the murderers' hideout, where he is accepted as part of the gang. Learning of the boss's secret identity by comparing handwritten notes, he has a plan that will enable the Sheriff to round them all up.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/L6e_HCmOGfw


Original title: Randy Rides Alone (1934)
Available with English, French & Spanish audio, and also subtitled in many more language options.

Director: Harry L. Fraser 
Writers: Lindsley Parsons, Lindsley Parsons 
Stars: John Wayne, Alberta Vaughn, George 'Gabby' Hayes 
Genre: Action, Drama, Mystery, Romance, Western


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
03:48 In a Wild West town, a sheriff investigates a shooting at a saloon and uncovers a plot to take over the establishment.
18:43 Intrigue unfolds in a Western setting as a lone man gets caught up in a criminal gang's schemes.
33:33 A tale of deception, betrayal, and redemption unfolds in a Western setting with hidden money and mistaken identities.
